content.question: Which of the following statements best explains the change in voter turnout in both presidential and legislative elections between 2003 and 2011 ?

choices.label: The government’s inability to effectively respond to political violence
The government’s effective anti-corruption campaign and increase in transparency
The government’s successful effort to gain admission into the Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC)
The government’s inability to maintain civilian control of the military

content.answer: The government’s inability to effectively respond to political violence

topic.text: 3.5: Nature and Role of Political Participation

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain what the data implies or illustrates about political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
